document.full_text: the arrest of the i.m.f. chief, dominique strauss-kahn, for an alleged sexual attack of a maid at a new york hotel sent tremors through the french media and blogosphere on sunday.
document.title: the lede: the french reaction to i.m.f. chief's arrest
lines_and_colors: the arrest of the i.m.f. chief, dominique strauss-kahn, for an alleged sexual attack of a maid at a new york hotel sent tremors through the french media and blogosphere on sunday.
